remarks: A structure with a constant group addition operation and at least two elements is not a monoid.  (Contributed by AV, 16-Feb-2020.)
statement:
copisnmnd.b $e |- B = ( Base ` M ) $.
copisnmnd.p $e |- ( +g ` M ) = ( x e. B , y e. B |-> C ) $.
copisnmnd.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. B ) $.
copisnmnd.n $e |- ( ph -> 1 < ( # ` B ) ) $.
copisnmnd $p |- ( ph -> M e/ Mnd ) $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x y $.
$d ph x y $.
